description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国共产主义青年团中央委员会书记处书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，简称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

en: Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的全国领导机构。
description.en: The national leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 徐丰曾任中国共产主义青年团中央委员会书记处书记。
description.en: Xu Feng formerly served as a secretary of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.
